name: Elon Task's Verification
description:
Elon Task's Verification is a funny game that requires from player to collect 44000000000 dollars.

You can get In-Game Special spells (x2, x4, x100, x1000), these will help you collect the money faster.

be careful!, the robot wave size and bots speed is increasing over time.

Download is now for free and have fun!
